column4: Hey everyone. I am using Blender in 11.10, which uses alt-RMB to select. when I do so, it brings up an Ubuntu menu for maximize,minmize close, etc. How can I disable this?
install compiz-settings or compiz-config-settingsmanager (depending on your version), then change the keybindings ;)
Unity uses compiz for its effects and bindings, afaik, in the settingsmanager you can search for keybindings using the advanced search option, I'd look there and give it a try
maybe backup your settings first (there a button for that somewhere)
